[[Boomerang (TV channel)]] | subsid = | homepage = http://europe.turnerinfo.com | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Turner Broadcasting System Russia''' is [[Turner Broadcasting System Europe]]'s division in Russia, based in Moscow.[http://sofftly.ru/IO.php?O=o&D00F00=E84/F18.HTM&date_load=2010-04-01][http://satlife.info/main/transpondernie_novosti/96-plany-turner-broadcasting-system-na-2010-god.html] ==Channels== * [[Cartoon Network (Russia and Southeastern Europe)| Cartoon Network (Russia)]] * [[Turner Classic Movies]] * [[Boomerang (TV channel)]] * [[TCM & Cartoon Network]] ==See also== * [[The Walt Disney Company CIS]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://europe.turnerinfo.com Turner Info Europe] * [http://www.cartoonnetwork.ru Cartoon Netork (Russia)] * [http://www.tcmeurope.com/ru/ TCM Russia] {{TBS}} {{Time Warner}} [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Russia]] [[Category:Media companies of Russia]] [[Category:Companies based in Moscow]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System ]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Europe]] [[Category:Time Warner]]
